formalText: She began by talking a lot about her feelings regarding the emails that James was sending.
She states, "I don't know whether I'm like angry about this or just scared or just don't feel good".
She states, "I don't feel good about having my family know these things about me and I don't feel good that I wasn't the one who got to tell them about it.
like the conversation that I had with James in the last week or so felt
intimate and understanding and relaxed and supported you know, and then he ended up passing it on to other people
That's why I don't feel good"
She feels she is not allowed to be angry about it and says, "that sucks".
When he conveys that he's angry, it seems like part of the problem is that she feels it is her fault.
James sent out an update to her family about what was happening and she didn't know how to feel about it at first. Then she started feeling very upset.
She states, "it's reasonable for James to be upset and like it's reasonable for him to sort of feel hurt.
I'm giving him a hard time trying to like both take care of me and take care of our family in this way.
But if I think too hard about it, then I say well, I'm just a terrible person for being upset in the first place".
Talked about meeting one of her priests, Amelia who she likes a lot.
